snippet: The agency, Amaq, is not officially part of the Islamic State’s media apparatus — but it functions much that way, Rukmini Callimachi writes.
abstract: Amaq News Agency functions as de facto media outlet for Islamic State, despite attempt to appear objective; service is frequently first to publish via smartphone app confirmation of Islamic State's responsibility for attacks; militant group, which operates its own more overtly propagandist media, has tacitly allowed Amaq to flourish.
lead_paragraph: The agency, Amaq, is not officially part of the Islamic State’s media apparatus — but it functions much that way, Rukmini Callimachi writes.

headline.main: A News Agency With Scoops Directly From ISIS, and a Veneer of Objectivity
headline.print_headline: A News Agency With Scoops Directly From ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
